name: LAS (LASer) File Format, Version 1.4
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">las</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: File format for the interchange of 3-dimensional point cloud data, developed and is maintained as a public specification by the American Society for Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing (ASPRS).  Developed primarily for exchange of LIDAR point cloud data, this format supports the exchange of any 3-dimensional x,y,z tuplet data.
